home_tab_delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this tab ?
home_tab_locked: You can not modify this tab
home_tab_locked_message: This tab has been configured by an administrator and can not be deleted or modified.
new_tab_select: 1. Choose the type of tab to create
widgets_desc: Allows to create a grid of different types of widgets.
restricted_access_message: You can not access this tab because all access conditions are not met.

restrictions.dismiss_help: As a manager, you can still access the tab, even if the access conditions are not met.
restrictions.locked_help: Please enter the code given to you in order to access the tab.
restrictions.period_opened: The access period to the tab is currently in progress.
restrictions.period_opened_help: The tab is accessible from %start% to %end%.
restrictions.period_not_limited: The access period to the tab is not limited.
restrictions.not_started: The tab is not yet accessible.
restrictions.ended: The tab is no longer accessible.
